body.name: Lenovo 400 USB-C Compact Wired Mouse – Pocket Friendly Portable Mouse for Notebook or Large Computer Monitor, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 3 mins
features: Ultimate Ultrabook Companion: The Lenovo 400 USB-C Wired Compact Mouse is the perfect companion for your Ultrabook. It's lightweight, pocket-sized, and incredibly portable, making it ideal for users on the go.

Hassle-Free Connectivity: Enjoy hassle-free connectivity with this USB-C mouse. Simply plug it in, and you're ready to go, without the need for dongles or batteries, ensuring a seamless and efficient user experience.

On-The-Fly Precision: Boost your on-the-go productivity with the Lenovo 400 USB-C mouse. Its precise red optical sensor and up to 2400 DPI that is adjust able on the fly it will enhance your accuracy and overall productivity.
Comfortable Ambidextrous Design: Designed for both left and right-handed users, this ambidextrous mouse fits comfortably in the palm of your hand, ensuring extended use without discomfort.

Broad Compatibility: The Lenovo 400 USB-C Compact Wired Mouse is compatible with any system featuring a USB-C port. It supports Windows 10, Windows 11, and Chrome OS, offering versatility across various platforms.
body.description: The Lenovo 400 USB-C Compact Wired Mouse is not only pocket-friendly and portable but also offers a seamless USB-C wired connection. With its advanced red optical sensor, on-the-fly DPI adjustment, and ambidextrous design, it's the perfect accessory for on-the-go users, whether you're working on a notebook or a large monitor.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 279 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Perfect Ultrabook Companion Pocket-friendly sized and totally portable, the Lenovo 400 USB-C Wired Compact Mouse is designed for those who live life on the go. No batteries required, simply plug in the USB-C cable and scroll and click away. Featuring an advanced red optical sensor and up to 2400 on-the-fly DPI adjustment, precision and accuracy is guaranteed whether you are working on a notebook or large monitor.

Hassle -free connectivity Free up your notebook’s limited number of USB-A ports with this must-have USB-C accessory. No need to worry about any batteries. Simply plug in the cable and enjoy zero latency while pointing and navigating.

Great for on-the-go productivity Get more done from anywhere with this compact, portable mouse. Its precise red optical sensor lets you instantly adjust the DPI on the fly to increase your accuracy and productivity, regardless of your laptop or PC’s screen size.

Built-in comfort and portability Whether you are right- or left-handed, this lightweight mouse fits perfectly into the palm of your hand or pocket. Designed for comfort and extended use, it’s the perfect companion for any Ultrabook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mouse, good price!
reviews.reviewText: This mouse works perfectly with my Macbook! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact mouse.
reviews.reviewText: Mouse works as expected. Light weight an easy glide makes use comfortable and without strain. Works as you expect a mouse should. I happen to prefer a really light touch and this delivers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Plug and play for my android tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good travel or backup mouse
reviews.reviewText: Very good for what it is. It’s very light and kind of small. But I use it when I am working out of the office. So it serves its purpose very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works well on MacBook pro 2023 m3
reviews.reviewText: it's simple. no flashy lights. it works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly well, not too big and not too small. Lightweight and nice click feeling. Love it. The material is premium and the finish really good. At this price point I’m excitedly surprised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not so great for claw grips
reviews.reviewText: Three design flaws:1: The sharp side edge for the buttons really digs into your thumb and ring finger (claw grips) over time, causing fatigue and not wanting to grab at the painful mouse. Might not be a problem for palm grip users.2: The underside feet have very straight long horizontal edges. This causes the mouse to 'scrape' at a mouse pad when moved directly forward/back. Its the kind of 'scrape' that makes you think something is on the mouse pad, so you brush at it. Only to find out its just the feet on the mouse itself.3: When the optics fire up when you move the mouse, there is an audible high electrical whine coming from the mouse. Its quiet when the mouse is left alone, but when you go to move it, the optics fire up again and it whines. This is heard in my office, and I'm in an urban city area.Whats good:The button pushes are decent. The mouse wheel rolls decent. Its a usb-c plug so it works directly on modern macbooks. Its dirt cheap for a travel mouse you need in a pinch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for the price.
reviews.reviewText: My son managed somehow to ruin the Apple mouse that came with his iMac, so I bought this one thinking that if (when) he breaks it I won’t be out much. Turns out it’s a great little mouse. Solid and responsive. Surprisingly great purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality USB-C wired mouse at a good price
reviews.reviewText: I just plugged it into my new laptop, and it just started to work. I only had to change its sensitivity setting to match my previous mouse. Good price, good mouse.

reviews.reviewTitle: Funciona super bem no meu MacBook Air

reviews.reviewText: It works great but it makes this high pitched sound. I didn’t notice it at first, I thought I had tinnitus, but it only happened in one room of the house. Turns out it’s this computer mouse. I no longer have the box so I can’t return it. It is pretty annoying actually.
It works well, has a comfortable grip. Only thing is it has a high pitched noise when in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Only works well with Microsoft software. Sent back via UPS. No notification it’s been received back or refund 3 weeks on. I wouldn’t advise buying this product!
